## EthersLiquity.getErc20TokenBalance() method

Get the amount of Erc20 tokens held by an address.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getErc20TokenBalance(address?: string, overrides?: EthersCallOverrides): Promise<Decimal>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | Address whose balance should be retrieved. |
|  overrides | [EthersCallOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherscalloverrides.md) |  |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md)<!-- -->&gt;
